title: Login issue on website
description: User cannot log in with valid credentials on the main portal.

title: Payment gateway error
description: Credit card payments fail intermittently during checkout.

title: Feature request: Dark mode
description: Customer requests a dark mode theme for the dashboard.

title: Slow performance on mobile app
description: Mobile app takes too long to load user data.

title: Bug: Incorrect invoice total
description: Invoices generated show incorrect totals when discounts apply.

title: Account suspension issue
description: Account suspended without notification for multiple users.

title: Email notifications not sending
description: System fails to send email alerts for new messages.

title: UI alignment issue on dashboard
description: Widgets are misaligned on high-resolution screens.

title: Security vulnerability report
description: Potential XSS vulnerability found on feedback form.

title: Password reset link expired too soon
description: Reset links expire after 5 minutes instead of 30.

title: Analytics data mismatch
description: Analytics dashboard numbers differ from exported reports.

title: Feature request: Multi-language support
description: Customer suggests adding support for French and Spanish.
